intro: Senecio gertii, commonly known as the Gertii groundsel, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and is adapted to arid environments. It features narrow, linear leaves and produces small yellow flowers that bloom in spring. Senecio gertii is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its hardy nature and attractive appearance.
